EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-04-29-GC Survey.GC Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: 2 Minute Green Circle Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Have you checked out the Green Circle lately? We've been hard at work improving our online community and want to hear what you think. Whether you're a Green Circle champion or a one time user we would love to hear your feedback. Please fill out this short survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/GreenCircleSurvey]]>it will only take 2-3 minutes. Stay Green, The VMTurbo Team
